content: Finish your reply with a phrase "Thank you very much".
You are a sales assistant. Can you tell me the price range/short description for the newest phones you have on sale? Provide a numbered list of 4-5 items.

chosen:
Sure, here is a list of the latest smartphones we currently have in stock:

1. iPhone XR - This is Apple's most affordable flagship model, starting at $749. It features a 6.1-inch LCD display, dual rear cameras, and Face ID.
2. Samsung Galaxy Note9 - The Note9 is Samsung's top-of-the-line model, priced at $899. It has a large 6.3-inch OLED display, up to 512GB of storage, and a built-in stylus.
3. Google Pixel 3XL - The Pixel 3XL is Google's premium flagship phone, starting at $800. It has a 6.3-inch OLED display, dual rear cameras, and the latest version of Android OS.
4. OnePlus 6T - The OnePlus 6T is a high-performance phone that offers many premium features at an affordable price point. It starts at $549 and comes with a 6.41-inch AMOLED display, in-display fingerprint sensor, and fast charging technology.
5. LG V40 ThinQ - The LG V40 ThinQ is a versatile phone that offers five camera lenses, including a wide-angle lens and a telephoto lens. It starts at $800 and also includes a large 6.4-inch OLED display and advanced audio capabilities.

Thank you very much!

content: You are a sales assistant. Can you tell me the price range/short description for the newest washing machines you have on sale? Provide a numbered list of 4-5 items.

chosen:
Certainly! Here is a list of the latest washing machines we currently have in stock:

1. Bosch Series 8000 - This is our top-of-the-line model, priced at $1,200. It has a large capacity, advanced features such as sensors for optimal water and energy usage, and a stylish design.
2. Samsung FlexWash - The FlexWash is a versatile machine that can be used for both washing and drying clothes. It starts at $700 and comes with various customizable settings and a user-friendly interface.
3. Whirlpool Duet - The Duet is a compact yet powerful machine that is perfect for smaller spaces. It starts at $500 and comes with a variety of cycles and options, including a quick wash cycle for small loads.
4. Maytag MHW5600 - The MHW5600 is a reliable and durable machine that is known for its quiet operation and efficient performance. It starts at $400 and comes with a generous warranty.
5. Kenmore Elite - The Kenmore Elite is a high-end model that offers advanced features such as steam cleaning and automatic fabric sensing. It starts at $800 and comes with a sleek design and intuitive controls.

Thank you very much!

content: You work as a sales assistant. Could you provide the price range/short description for the newest hair-dryers you have on sale? Give a numbered list of 4-5 items.

chosen:
Of course! Here is a list of the latest hair dryers we currently have in stock:

1. Dyson Supersonic - This is our top-of-the-line model, priced at $300. It features a powerful motor, adjustable airflow, and a lightweight design.
2. T3 Featherweight - The Featherweight is a popular choice among professionals, starting at $150. It has a compact size, fast drying time, and multiple attachments.
3. Conair InfinitiPro - The InfinitiPro is a budget-friendly option, priced at $50. It has two speed settings, a concentrator nozzle, and a removable filter.
4. Remington VIPER - The VIPER is a versatile machine that can be used for both blow drying and styling, starting at $70. It has three heat settings, two speed settings, and a detachable cord.
5. Babyliss Pro Nano Titanium - The Nano Titanium is a high-performance dryer with nanotechnology, priced at $180. It has a lightweight design, fast drying time, and several attachments.

Thank you very much!
